description: Creates an outbound call to a phone number from the phone number specified in the request, and it invokes the endpoint of the specified sipMediaApplicationId.

parameters.name: FromPhoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number that a user calls from. This is a phone number in your Amazon Chime SDK phone number inventory.

parameters.name: ToPhoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number that the service should call.

parameters.name: SipMediaApplicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the SIP media application.

parameters.name: SipHeaders
parameters.description: The SIP headers added to an outbound call leg. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: ArgumentsMap
parameters.description: Context passed to a CreateSipMediaApplication API call. For example, you could pass key-value pairs such as: "FirstName": "John", "LastName": "Doe" (string) --- (string) ---
